lines: !throw You are not a registered player! Please use `!e new_game` first.
!throw You can't open another door in the middle of battle!

!say You find a **{!data monster {monster} params emoji} {!data monster {monster} title}**!
❤️ HP: {!tag {me} monster_hp}/{!tag {me} monster_hp}
⚔️ Attack: {!tag {me} monster_min_attack}-{!tag {me} monster_max_attack}
_ _
You may:
- !e stats
- !e inventory
- !e use <item>
- !e attack
- !e flee
